articles.description: All factors driving bull market have not deteriorated. Only some marginal deterioration at the margin is happening and one has to be a little careful.
articles.content: Consolidation within sectors is underway. We have to remain invested and stay positive in medium term, says Ravi Dharamshi, Founder & MD, ValueQuest Investment Advisors.Last time when we were spe… [+8543 chars]

articles.title: Zomato CEO Apologises After Calling Out Swiggy For Night Deliveries In Mumbai - Twitter Reacts - NDTV Food

articles.title: Explained: Lower fuel prices may not last beyond elections, hurt BPCL valuation - The Indian Express
articles.description: Petrol and diesel prices in India: A correction in crude oil prices to about $62 per barrel in early April has allowed OMCs to cut the price of petrol and diesel by about 75 paise per litre.
articles.content: Oil Marketing Companies (OMCs) cut the prices of petrol and diesel by 14-16 paise per litre across major cities on Thursday after a 15-day halt in price revisions as the states of West Bengal, Tamil … [+3296 chars]
